caption: Agentic RAG Workflow Execution
description: Tracks each execution of an agent-based retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) workflow including all agent steps, tool usage, decisions, and content flow.
name: agentic_rag_workflow_execution

workflow_id.description: Unique identifier for the RAG workflow instance.

agent_id.description: Identifier of the agent orchestrating the workflow.

agent_framework.description: Framework used to define the agent logic (e.g., LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen).

rag_strategy.description: Strategy applied in the RAG process (simple_rag, multi-hop, hierarchical).

retriever_type.description: Retrieval backend used (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate, Elasticsearch).

retrieved_doc_count.description: Number of documents retrieved during the RAG process.

reranking_model.description: Name of model used to rerank retrieved documents.

embedding_model.description: Name or version of the embedding model used (e.g., text-embedding-ada-002).

llm_model.description: The final LLM model used to generate the answer (e.g., gpt-4, mistral-7b).

query_text.description: The original query submitted to the RAG pipeline.

final_answer.description: The final synthesized response output from the RAG workflow.

output_tokens.description: Number of tokens generated in the final answer.

input_tokens.description: Total input tokens including the query, context, and prompt template.

total_latency_ms.description: Total latency of the workflow in milliseconds.

error_message.description: Error message if the workflow encountered a failure.

session.description: Session for context grouping (e.g., for analytics or tracing).

region.description: Cloud or physical region of execution (e.g., us-west-2, eu-central-1).

workflow_steps.description: A list of individual, traceable steps executed during the RAG workflow.
